64.eng-name: Military Expeditions led by the Prophet (pbuh) (Al-Maghaazi)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said to his companions who were at Al-Hijr, "Do not enter upon these people who are being punished, except in a weeping state, lest the same calamity as of theirs should befall you

chapter.ara-name: باب نُزُولُ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم الْحِجْرَ
chapter.eng-name: The dismounting of the Prophet (ﷺ) at Al-Hijr
